structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: Each TVA peace officer appointed and commissioned pursuant to KRS 61.886 to 61.892 shall, while on duty, wear a badge or shield identifying him as an employee either of the TVA public safety service or of the TVA Land Between the Lakes Protection Section. When acting as a detective in the service of TVA as an employee in the performance of his assigned duties, he may wear his badge, shield, or weapon concealed. Each TVA peace officer may, while on duty, wear such other insignia and identification, including uniform, as will plainly indicate to the public that he is a TVA peace officer.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 7, effective June 17, 1978.
